page.title: 19VILLAGE SURVEY PART 3
page.content: FROM A SURVEY OF THE VILLAGE WE FOUND THAT THERE WAS A WIDE VARIETY OF JOBS.OUT OF 145 JOBS NOTED THERE WERE 56 DIFFERENT KINDS.THERE WERE 12 IN FARMING;10 EACH IN THE BUILDING TRADE AND SHOP WORK;8 WORKED IN OFFICES;8 IN HEALTH;7 IN THE STEELWORKS.WE FOUND THAT THERE WERE 6 DIRECTORS OR MANAGERS AND 3 LABOURERS.OTHER PROFESSIONS INCLUDED 2 TEACHERS;1 SOLICITOR;2 ACCOUNTANTS;1 SURVEYOR;1 CIVIL ENGINEER;1 BANK CLERK AND 1 PROBATION OFFICER.TRADES WERE;3 ELECTRICIANS;2 DECORATORS;1 PLUMBER;2 WELDERS;3 FITTERS AND A SAWYER.THERE WERE ALSO A FURNITURE MAKER AND AN ANIMATOR.THERE WAS A VARIETY OF OTHER JOBS INCLUDING HOTEL WORKERS,POWER STATION WORKERS,LAND DRAINAGE,LORRY DRIVERS,SALESMEN,A DOCKER AND A HAIR DRESSER.THERE WERE 48 RETIRED AND 6 UNEMPLOYED.
